original_text:
The angel of the Lord also said to her:
“You are now pregnant
    and you will give birth to a son.
You shall name him Ishmael,
    for the Lord has heard of your misery.
korean_text: 여호와의 사자가 또 그에게 이르되 네가 임신하였은즉 아들을 낳으리니 그 이름을 이스마엘이라 하라 이는 여호와께서 네 고통을 들으셨음이니라

sentences.original_text: The angel of the Lord also said to her:
and you will give birth to a son.
for the Lord has heard of your misery.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 주께서 당신의 고통을 들으셨기 때문입니다.
